title: why no one play ekko adc?
body: my last game with this, its legit so op : https://imgur.com/a/p5dbbKR

replies.body:
Doing well in 1 game where the enemy didn't know what they were against doesn't make something op 

He isn't played bot because his w is useless unless you have someone with reliable hard cc such as an ali to keep them in it, his engage is not good into multiple people and you will always have to ult away which makes it easy for the enemy team to either zone you away from creeps or just kill you and ekkos q isn't that reliable unless you use it in their face which just gets you killed because the support can just lock you down while the adc or apc kills you

This looks like it's only 1 game of majority Silver players so : Low Elo
Looking into your account I only see ONE instance of ADC Ekko : Possibly lucky? 
Looking into the game details I see that the mani source of damage was the Brand : Is it Ekko that's op or the Brand Support with the ~35k damage?
In short, it's not enough information to follow your claim that Ekko adc is op if you've only tried it out once.

> [{quoted}](name=S V ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vfdOp2uQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-29T06:00:59.128+0000)

> This looks like it's only 1 game of majority Silver players so : Low Elo
> Looking into your account I only see ONE instance of ADC Ekko : Possibly lucky?

> In short, it's not enough information to follow your claim that Ekko adc is op if you've only tried it out once.

i did this also another game a while before and still won, can't access it in match history

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Uchiwa,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vfdOp2uQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-29T06:06:09.881+0000)
>
> i did this also another game a while before and still won, can't access it in match history

Let me rephrase that, the pool of "ADC Ekko games" is too low and the rank is mediocre at best. and your claiming to "save the game from ashes" is only your opinion that doesn't speak for the main person I'm looking at : The Brand.

> [{quoted}](name=S V ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vfdOp2uQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-29T06:00:59.128+0000)

> In short, it's not enough information to follow your claim that Ekko adc is op if you've only tried it out once.

i dont think i was lucky my whole team was feeding early game but i saved the game from ashes

I can play Ekko bot, but then again I am a 1 trick plat 3 Ekko main. I would recommend doing it with a duo partner and have them pick a ranged/sustain support (like nami who can give you move speed and heal you) and you can do pretty good.

the real mystery is why no ad diana

no really that shit worked in earlier seasons
